Title: Authorizes certain municipalities to make ordinances regarding longbows and crossbows
Summary: Authorizes the towns of Huntington, Smithtown and Brookhaven, in the county of Suffolk to make ordinances prohibiting the discharge of longbows and crossbows in areas in which such activity may be hazardous to the general public or nearby residents.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to authorizing certain municipalities to make ordinances regarding longbows and crossbows
